name: CQ.Ext.grid.AbstractSelectionModel
doc:
Abstract base class for grid SelectionModels.  It provides the interface that should be
implement...

props.name: grid
props.doc: The GridPanel for which this SelectionModel is handling selection. Read-only.

methods.name: enableBubble
methods.doc:
Enables events fired by this Observable to bubble up an owner hierarchy by calling
this.getBubble...

methods.name: isLocked
methods.doc: Returns true if the selections are locked.

methods.name: relayEvents
methods.doc: Relays selected events from the specified Observable as if the events were fired by this.
